natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer
Class InferenceModule

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer.InferenceModule
public class InferenceModule
extends java.lang.Object

This module is responsible for applying inference rules with the generation of referring expressions. It uses a JTP reasoning context for the reasoning.

Method Detail

chooseKindOfExpression

public int chooseKindOfExpression(java.lang.String e1,
                                  java.lang.String e2,
                                  java.lang.String c2,
                                  java.util.Vector ents)
Checks whether a bridging description can be used and returns the kind of expression to be generated (using a definite or indefinite article and including the van-part or not)

Parameters:
e1 - the entity e2 is related to (e.g. castle01)
e2 - the entity that is related to e1 (e.g. gate01)
c2 - the concept of e2
ents - the vector with all entities mentioned sofar
